attributes.action: To Make roads safer outside all schools.
attributes.background: From experience from my own children having nearer misses, To prevent any more children from getting hurt or seriously hurt. To make it official all schools have speed humps, road markings in place, to slow traffic down before approaching schools, crossings etc.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you would like to make roads safer outside schools, but are not sure what safety measures you would like introduced. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

If you want to make it compulsory for councils to have zebra crossings outside every school, you may wish to sign this petition instead: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/223265
